Dates of inspection: SEP 13 OCT 04 SEP 24 OCT 10 SEP 25 SEP 27
(A) Evidence of Erosion: Some silting after heavy rains, from the logging roads.
(D) Spawning distribution: Not many fish above the bridges this year. Possibly coho in the upper reaches.
(E) Comments on predators: Not many bears, but seals in the harbour.
(K) Additional comments: System undergoing studies for industrial use. Time is needed to properly enumerate the later seaon coho and find extent of their migration. System should be assigned priority, with weekly visits
